invalid_version_message: Please update your application to the latest version.
invalid_value: Invalid value. Please check your input again.
invalid_input_required_message: Please fill all the required fields.
invalid_password: Password must consist of [a-z], [A-Z], [0-9], and [!@#$%^], with 8 to 32 characters.
invalid_username: Username must consist of 4 to 16 characters.
invalid_phone_not_available: Phone number has already been registered.
invalid_email_not_available: Email address has already been registered.
invalid_negative: Must be greater or equal to 0.
invalid_product: You do not have an access to this product. Please contact our customer service.
invalid_setup_message: There is a problem with your device setup. Please set the application again.
invalid_store_access: You do not have access to this store.
invalid_camera_permission: Camera permission is required to scan QR.
invalid_camera_scan: Unable to access device's camera to scan.
invalid_zero: The amount must be greater than zero.
failed_jailbroken_message: Mille is not supported on a jailbroken device due to security reasons.
failed_developer_mode_message: Mille is not supported on a device with active developer mode. Please switch off the developer mode.
failed_no_connection: Unable to connect to the server.
failed_timeout: Connection timeout. Please check the settings and network status.
failed_invalid_session: Your session has ended. Please login again.
failed_invalid_format: One or more inputs are invalid. Please check your inputs again.
failed_access_denied: You do not have access to the selected menu.
failed_invalid_credential: Username and password do not match.
